uint32_t pspfpu_get_fs (void)
 Get the current value of the FS bit (if FS is 0 then an exception occurs with denormalized values, if 1 then they are rewritten as 0.

 Set the FS bit.

uint32_t pspfpu_get_fs (  void   ) 
 

Get the current value of the FS bit (if FS is 0 then an exception occurs with denormalized values, if 1 then they are rewritten as 0.

Returns:
The current state of the FS bit (0 or 1)
